item.description:
We'll see a great movie Heathers, a dark comedy (I'm a Winona Ryder fan) - great way to learn the Enneagram - and clarify all the characters regarding type and type relationship dynamics - a perfect way to deepen your knowledge of the Enneagram. We'll stop and start the movie to clearly see types and relationship dynamics in the movie, including subtypes. Lots of fun. Dinner and snacks provided! Bring food if you like.

Vegetarian Dinner 7:00 Movie 8:00

$20, dinner, movie, analysis

Herb Pearce is an Enneagram expert, workshop leader, therapist, phone coach and author of the Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and Herb's Tips for Living.

www.herbpearce.com

            781 648 3737      

herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.name: Enneagram at the Movies - Heathers
